Is there any Egyptian payment service that could mimic a credit card and works for international transactions not just local ones?
Vodafone cash, for example, works for local transactions only, is there any similar service that works for international transactions?
cuz apparently 17 year olds can only have debit cards that don't support online payments :(

posts.message: My talk at the second Front-end Egypt meetup about writing scalable, modular and maintainable CSS :)
posts.caption: youtube.com
posts.description: This video explains how to write CSS that can scale without a hassle and be maintainable. History of the previous attempts to make writing CSS a sane process...

posts.message:
This is an API I made for getting foreign exchange prices from some of the major banks in Egypt. 
It's free, with a couple of options and updated every 30 minutes. 
Feel free to us it of you need it.
posts.caption: market.mashape.com
posts.description: EGYPT FX API Documentation. A RESTful API to get latest foreign exchange prices in major Egyptian Banks.
